attributes.action: Void the results of the EU referendum if any party used misleading information
attributes.additional_details: Big red bus used by Boris Johnson and Nigel Farage to mislead, deceive and divide the country. It has since been found they cannot back their claim therefore it should be rendered void.
attributes.background: I strongly feel that a lot of people had been misled by the use of a slogan despite its inaccuracies and misleading message. In particular the 'fact' regarding the £350m a week being used when it's true value is questionable. This gave the wrong information to voters and shouldnot have been used.
